title: Unsecure changing password

profile.name: Liberapay
profile.about: An open source platform designed to facilitate recurrent donations.

vulnerability_information:
I would like to report about changing the password. When you change the password it didn't require the current password. The scenario here is when you forgot to logout your account when you login on other device it is easy to takeover the account by changing the password of it.

## Impact

Easy to takeover any account

activities.message:
This bug bounty program is not really meant for best practice issues and technical bugs. Please only submit significant security vulnerabilities that can be actively exploited against users of the platform in question. Companies use issue trackers for these type of issues and therefore we are not interested in receiving such submissions here on HackerOne.

So, in future, make sure that your submission is not just a general best practice recommendation, something that requires very unlikely user intereaction, or an issue where there are plenty of simpler ways of affecting users of the platform.

As an example, strive to be like @fransrosen, @gerben_javado, @smiegles, and many of the other top bug bounty hunters — they would not go to all the trouble of submitting something along the lines of what you have submitted here. If you have any questions or want some advice, please feel free to reach out to me via email or refer to hacker101.com.
